testCases.explanation: Acquire items greedily: pick items of cost 2 and 3, combined cost 5 to meet the requirement.
Only one item needed, cost is 1.
All items cost 5, only need the minimum to satisfy requirement: 5.
Pick cheapest items greedily: 1+2+3=6 to cover the required sum.

description: Given an array `nums` of item costs, find the minimum total cost to acquire the required set of items. Each item can only be acquired once.

examples.explanation: Acquire items with costs 2 and 3, total cost = 5.
